agent_utterance: Try a two-minute evening cue-check ritual. When you feel fatigue or stress in the evening, pause and name the cue (e.g., 'evening stress'). Then choose one quick non-food action to do right away: 1) stretch for 2 minutes, 2) take 5 deep breaths, 3) drink a glass of water or seltzer, 4) a brief 3-minute walk. Immediately log what you did and your hunger level before and after. Repeat this consistently for the next few days to reinforce the ritual and steadily reduce snack urges.
